scripts.check: pnpm -F frontend exec biome check src && pnpm -F backend exec biome check src
scripts.fix: pnpm -F frontend exec biome check src --write && pnpm -F backend exec biome check src --write
scripts.dev: pnpm -F frontend build && pnpm -F backend dev
scripts.build: pnpm -F frontend build && pnpm -F backend build
